author: Special Correspondent
text:
Due to track maintenance works by Palakkad Division between Ettimadai and Walayar, two pairs of passenger trains have been partially cancelled on January 2.

The train numbers 56650/ 56651 Cannanore - Coimbatore passenger trains will be partially cancelled between Palakkad and Coimbatore and train numbers 66609/ 66608 Erode - Palakkad Town MEMU passenger will be partially cancelled between Coimbatore and Palakkad Town, according to an official press release of the Salem Railway Division issued here on Friday.
title: Trains partially cancelled
